item.title: Top 10 FREE Academic Research Tools that You Must Use NOW
item.description: Conducting academic research is hard. Whether it be searching for articles, reading through tons of papers or maybe writing one yourself, the work can take its toll. This article consists of a list of free tools that you can use at various steps of your research activities that just might make your life a little easier.

item.title: Guidelines to Follow When Writing a Research Paper
item.description: This article is not meant to be a complete guide for paper writing. It is just a cheat sheet for me to follow when I’m lost. A research paper typically has the following sections: Title Abstract Introduction Literature review Methodology Experiment/Results Acknowledgments (Optional) Conclusion References Appendices (Optional) 1.

item.title: DSSE: A Software Engineering Research Group in Bangladesh
item.description: If you want to know about research areas in Software Engineering and conferences/journals related to software engineering then this article is for you. The Distributed Systems and Software Engineering (DSSE) group at the Institute of Information Technology (IIT) is an active group dedicated to Software Engineering research.
